analysis.description:
KuaiMintableToken.judgeIsReachDailyLimit (/unique_chucks/27/0x38b03fe09d0a47bcbe7f80bd0441f9f83821437b.sol#462-492) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- (timestamp.parseTimestamp().year == lastMintTime.parseTimestamp().year) && (timestamp.parseTimestamp().month == lastMintTime.parseTimestamp().month) && (timestamp.parseTimestamp().day == lastMintTime.parseTimestamp().day)
	- (timestamp.parseTimestamp().year == lastMintTime.parseTimestamp().year) && (timestamp.parseTimestamp().month == lastMintTime.parseTimestamp().month) && (timestamp.parseTimestamp().day == lastMintTime.parseTimestamp().day)
	- (timestamp.parseTimestamp().year == lastMintTime.parseTimestamp().year) && (timestamp.parseTimestamp().month == lastMintTime.parseTimestamp().month) && (timestamp.parseTimestamp().day == lastMintTime.parseTimestamp().day)

BonusToken.standardDecimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x38b03fe09d0a47bcbe7f80bd0441f9f83821437b.sol#428-431)
KuaiToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x38b03fe09d0a47bcbe7f80bd0441f9f83821437b.sol)
KuaiToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x38b03fe09d0a47bcbe7f80bd0441f9f83821437b.sol)
KuaiToken.standard should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x38b03fe09d0a47bcbe7f80bd0441f9f83821437b.sol)
KuaiToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x38b03fe09d0a47bcbe7f80bd0441f9f83821437b.sol)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/27/0x38b03fe09d0a47bcbe7f80bd0441f9f83821437b.sol:
